items.sentence: This is where Tom said he buried the treasure.
This is where Tom said he found the gold coin.
The news that Tom had died surprised everyone.
We had to dig a pretty deep well to get water.
What did you really think of the way Tom sang?
I suspect Tom and Mary have both been injured.
I thought Tom and Mary were both under thirty.
I thought Tom was going to Australia with you.
Tom didn\'t think Mary would be upset by that.
If I were you, I\'d wait and see what happens.
